reviews.review_msg:
The Good:
- Responsive over email and office hours
- Knowledgeable in the field

The Bad:
- Exams are worth 55% when the course is almost predominantly cookbook-style labs, so exams are the first time you apply your knowledge
- Frustrating marking in labs

The lab is totally runned by TA Ashley this semester. lab guidance is always confusing and not detailed enough to make sense. (Especially the Discover QGIS book) Some important scoring points are not labeled in the assignment introduction, if you explain scoring points in lab then the same you should write them in canvas.
she's not helpful. sometimes rude to students. anal. lectures are disorganized.
